name: Simple Tuna Fish Tacos
author: JasLak
summary: Tuna tacos sounds funny, but these are delicious. I threw these together for dinner one night and now they're our favorite! If desired, serve with sour cream, fresh cilantro, and more hot sauce.
ingredients: 4 (6 ounce) cans solid white tuna packed in water, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add tomatoes, green onions, garlic, cumin, and oregano; saute until tomatoes are very soft, about 5 minutes
Add drained tuna; gently break into bite-sized pieces and mix in
Season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper
Cover and cook until tuna is warmed through, 2 to 3 minutes more
Stack 6 tortillas on a microwave-safe plate and cover with a damp paper towel
Heat in the microwave until pliable, 15 to 20 seconds
Spoon tuna mixture over warm tortillas
